attributes.action: Reinstate Boris Johnson as Prime Minister
attributes.additional_details: Boris Johnson should be given the chance to deliver on the manifesto he was elected on. At the very least he should be allowed the full 12 months from the no confidence vote (which he won!) to prove himself. It is shameful to circumvent this process to hound someone out of office. The government and Boris should be getting on with the job of delivering the manifesto and not playing around with political machinations and vendettas.
attributes.background: We want you to reject Boris Johnson's resignation and reinstate him as Prime Minister

rejection.details: Any decision to refuse Boris Johnson's resignation as Leader of the Conservative Party would be a decision for the Conservative Party, not the UK Government or House of Commons as a whole.
